sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"敲，击"之意。
means: knock ： 指用拳头或其它器械猛敲或猛打；也指用手轻敲某物。
tap ： 多指慢慢地连续地轻击或轻拍。
rap ： 指用手指或木棒等快速地轻敲或急拍。
pat ： 指用手轻拍以示同情、赞同或爱抚。

word_mean: 敲击，叩音：叩击坚硬表面时的声音
敲缸, 气缸内压力升高率太大时出现金属敲击声的现象。

sentence.Network_en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
sentence.Network_cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

sentence.Network_en: They decided to knock the two rooms into one.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们决定把两间屋子打通连成一间。

sentence.Network_en: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中啄字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ peck] (6) 敲击[ knock] (7) 咬[ bite].
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... chink（ 裂缝，裂口，漏洞）； knock（ 敲打，碰撞，摧毁）； kick（ 踢，反冲）…
九年级英语单词表 ... wooden 木制的 knock 敲；击；碰撞 knock into 与……相撞.
爆震（Knocking），敲击的意思，爆震时发动机会产生敲击声。轻微不连续的爆震声音相当清脆，有点类似轻敲金属管的声音或连续 …

初中英语短语归纳_百度知道 ... knock sb about 接连打击；粗暴对待 knock off 下班；收工 knock sb out 把某人打昏过去.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... knock down 撞倒；击落；拆除 knock off 把…敲掉；击倒；停工 knock out 敲空；(拳击中)击倒.

jx.jx_en_mean: To be rough or brutal with; maltreat.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 虐待：粗暴或残忍地对待；虐待

jx.jx_en_mean: To wander from place to place
jx.jx_cn_mean: 游历：从一个地方漫游到另一个地方
【非正式用语】 讨论，思考

lj.lj_ly: met to knock around some ideas.
lj.lj_ls: 聚在一起讨论一些问题

jx.jx_cn_mean: 喝下（酒精饮料）

jx.jx_en_mean: To bring to the ground with a blow; topple.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 击倒在地：用一击打倒在地；使倒下

jx.jx_en_mean: To disassemble into parts, as for storage or shipping.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 拆卸：为了储藏或运输而拆卸成几部份

jx.jx_en_mean: To declare sold at an auction, as by striking a blow with a gavel.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 敲槌宣布卖出：在拍卖会上宣布货物卖出，比如用木槌敲击来宣布
【非正式用语】 削减价格等

lj.lj_ly: knocked all the radios down 20 percent.
lj.lj_ls: 把所有的收音机都降价百分之二十

jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【俚语】} 收到（工资）；赚
停止工作

lj.lj_ly: It's after five; let's knock off.

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To complete, accomplish, or dispose of hastily or easily; finish
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 仓促写出，即席作成：仓促或轻易地完成、做完或处理；结束

lj.lj_ly: That author knocks off a book a year.
lj.lj_ls: 那位作者在一年内仓促完成了这本书

jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 除掉；消除

lj.lj_ly: knocked off 12 pounds in a month.

jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【俚语】} 杀，战胜
&I{【俚语】} 持枪抢劫，拦路抢劫

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To copy or imitate, especially without permission
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 翻印：复印或模仿，尤指在未经允许的情况下
使昏迷不醒

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Sports} To defeat (a boxing opponent) by a knockout.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【体育运动】} 击倒对手：通过击到对方而击败（拳击比赛中的对手）
使无用，使失去效能

lj.lj_ly: The storm knocked out the telephones.

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Informal} To exert or exhaust (oneself or another) to the utmost
jx.jx_cn_mean: 【非正式用语】 尽心尽力：最大程度地努力或用尽（自己或别人的）力量

lj.lj_ly: knocked herself out to be ready on time.
lj.lj_ls: 为了及时作好准备她竭尽全力

jx.jx_en_mean: To make or assemble quickly or carelessly.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 仓促完成：很快或粗粗地制作或拼凑
&I{【俚语】} 使怀孕

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Chiefly British} To wake up or summon, as by knocking at the door.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【多用于英国】} 敲门叫醒或召唤
&I{【多用于英国】} 用尽力气；精疲力竭
(非正式)愤怒猛打
(非正式)给某人留下深刻印象

phrase.cizu_name: knock something into a cocked hat
knock someone into the middle of next week

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)对某人猛打

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cnocian, of imitative origin

encyclopedia.content: 基本释义 不及物动词 vi. 1.相撞，碰击[(+against)] His legs knocked against the chair. 他的两条腿撞到了椅子。 2.敲，击，打[(+on/at)] He knocked at the door and entered. 他敲了敲门便走进去了。 3.锛埛⒍扔捎诠收巷級发爆震声 及物动词 vt. 1.敲，击，打[O] The falling bottle knocked him on the head. 跌落的瓶子砸在他的头上。 2.击锛堊诧級成。..[O][O8] The blow knocked her senseless. 那一击把她打昏了。 3

entry.def: If you knock on something such as a door or window, you hit it, usually several times, to attract someone's attention.

example.ex: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door...
example.tran: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

example.ex: Knock at my window at eight o'clock and I'll be ready...
example.tran: 8点钟敲我的窗，我会准备好的。

entry.tran: 碰，撞；（尤指）碰倒，撞倒，敲动
entry.def: If you knock something, you touch or hit it roughly, especially so that it falls or moves.

example.ex: She accidentally knocked the tea tin off the shelf...
example.tran: 她不小心把架子上的茶叶罐碰了下来。

example.ex: The baby was knocked from his father's arms...
example.tran: 婴儿被从他父亲的怀中撞落。

entry.def: If someone knocks two rooms or buildings into one, or knocks them together, they make them form one room or building by removing a wall.

example.ex: They decided to knock the two rooms into one...
example.tran: 他们决定把两间屋子打通连成一间。

example.ex: The spacious kitchen was achieved by knocking together three small rooms.
example.tran: 这个宽敞的厨房是由3个小屋子打通连成的。

entry.tran: 把…撞击到（某个位置）；把…打成（某种状态）
entry.def: To knock someone into a particular position or condition means to hit them very hard so that they fall over or become unconscious.

example.ex: The third wave was so strong it knocked me backwards...
example.tran: 第3波浪太大了，把我打了回去。

example.ex: They were knocked to the ground and robbed of their wallets...
example.tran: 他们被打倒在地并被抢走了钱包。

entry.tran: 使失去（某种品质或特征）
entry.def: To knock a particular quality or characteristic out of someone means to make them lose it.

example.ex: The stories of his links with the actress had knocked the fun out of him...
example.tran: 有关他与那位女演员有关系的传闻使他很不开心。

example.ex: When they first joined for training many were starry eyed about just sailing around the world. We soon knocked that out of them...
example.tran: 在他们参加培训之初，很多人还只是对环球航行抱有天真的想法。我们很快便使他们消除了那种想法。

entry.def: If something knocks, it makes a repeated sharp banging noise.

example.ex: His old truck, knocking and smoking, pulled down the road and out of sight.
example.tran: 他那辆旧卡车一边冒着烟一边哐里哐啷地沿路向前驶去，直到驶出了视线。

entry.def: If you knock something or someone, you criticize them and say unpleasant things about them.

example.ex: I'm not knocking them: if they want to do it, it's up to them...
example.tran: 我不是批评他们：想不想做那件事取决于他们。

example.ex: Never knock charter flights; they are opening up the world for budget-conscious travellers.
example.tran: 绝不要挑剔包机航班；他们使精打细算的乘客能够去往世界各地。

entry.def: If someone receives a knock, they have an unpleasant experience which prevents them from achieving something or which causes them to change their attitudes or plans.

example.ex: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence...
example.tran: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

example.ex: The art market has suffered some severe knocks during the past two years.
example.tran: 在过去的两年间，艺术品市场遭受了严重的打击。

entry.tran: （尤指以相貌）给…留下深刻印象，使…倾倒
entry.def: To knock them dead means to impress people a great deal, especially with your appearance.

example.ex: Glamorous make-up is best reserved for days when you want to go all out to knock  'em dead.
example.tran: 魅惑彩妆最好留到你竭力想把所有人都迷倒的时候。

entry.def: If you tell someone to knock it off, you are telling them to stop doing something that is annoying you.

example.ex: Will you just knock it off!

means.word_mean: 1. the sound of knocking (as on a door or in an engine or bearing);

sentences.sentence: "he took a bash right in his face"
"he got a bang on the head"

means.word_mean: 1. deliver a sharp blow or push :"He knocked the glass clear across the room"
3. knock against with force or violence;
4. make light, repeated taps on a surface;

sentences.sentence: "he was tapping his fingers on the table impatiently"

means.word_mean: 5. sound like a car engine that is firing too early;

sentences.sentence: "the car pinged when I put in low-octane gasoline"
"The car pinked when the ignition was too far retarded"

means.word_mean: 6. find fault with; express criticism of; point out real or perceived flaws;

example.en: The store manager knocked 30 percent off the price of the coat.
example.zh: 商店经理将外套的价格降低了百分之三十。

example.en: They knocked off four window frames in an hour.
example.zh: 他们在一小时内仓促地赶做了四副窗架。

example.en: He knocked off a poem in 10 minutes.
example.zh: 他在十分钟内即席做了一首诗。

example.en: You couldn't knock off every objection.
One of those guys got knocked off.
example.zh: 这些家伙中有一个被干掉了。

example.en: The pair knocked off several shops, a bank，and some jewelry stores.
example.zh: 这俩人抢了几个铺子，一家银行和几家珠宝店。

example.en: Local cops had free authority to knock them off.
example.zh: 当地警察完全有权拘捕他们。

list.explanation: 用武力或责骂制止他人争吵，阐明道理要他人必须去干 (某事)

example.en: Do I have to come in there and knock some heads together, or will you kids settle down?
example.zh: 非要我进来骂一通，你们这些小子才会安静下来吗？

example.en: I knocked people's heads together and got the proposal out on time.
example.zh: 我讲明了道理，才让人准时把计划搞了出来。

list.explanation: 把某人或某物击倒，痛击某人

example.en: We knocked the villain for a loop.
example.zh: 我们把那恶棍狠狠揍了一顿。

list.explanation: 使某人十分惊奇、诧异、剌激、非常快活

example.en: The news of their marriage threw me for a loop.
example.zh: 他俩结婚的消息让我十分诧异。

example.en: I don't believe this climactic sequence doesn't knock you for a loop.
example.zh: 我不相信这一连串的高潮都剌激不了你。

example.en: Wouldn't that knock the boys for a loop?
example.zh: 难道那还不能让那些孩子快活吗？

list.explanation: 使某人或某事陷入困境，使受到严重干扰

example.en: The whole economy was thrown for a loop.
It must have knocked him for a loop,but he asked.
example.zh: 这件事一定使他吃了大亏，但这是他自找的。

example.en: Where did you get all those watches? Did you knock them over?
example.zh: 所有那些手表你都足从哪里摘来的？偷来的？

example.en: The cops knocked over a reputed bookmakitig parlor.
example.zh: 警察突然査抄了一家名气很响的马票经纪所。

auth_sentence.content: Jist then there wus a knock at the daur.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jist then there wus a knock at the daur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jist then there wus a knock at the daur.

auth_sentence.content: His political fortunes will now take a nasty knock.
auth_sentence.res_content: His political fortunes will now take a nasty knock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His political fortunes will now take a nasty knock.

auth_sentence.content: It seemed to knock Chelsea out of their stride.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seemed to knock Chelsea out of their stride.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seemed to knock Chelsea out of their stride.

Sentence.sentence: Finally, on June 7, McLaughlin once again demonstrated his carelessness by knocking down several mailboxes near the edge of the company's parking lot.

sentences.en: When he heard the knock, he ceased writing.
sentences.cn: 当他听到敲门声, 就停下来不写了。

sentences.en: The children were knocking the bottom of the box.

means.word_mean: 批评, 数落, 非难

sentences.en: The newspapers are too fond of knocking the team.

jushi.english: I heard a knock at the window just now.
jushi.chinese: 我刚才听到了敲窗户的声音。

jushi.english: I heard a knock, what's matter?
jushi.chinese: 我听到发动机有爆震声,怎么回事?

jushi.english: The hard knock made her cry.
